alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 2:37PM MST until December 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY TO 11 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected mainly above 9000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM Thursday to 11 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
